121  Point operator -(const Point& p) const {
122  const size_t D = coords.size();
123  FT coordinates[D];

234  FT operator *(const Point& p) const {
235  FT product = 0;
236  const size_t D = coords.size();
237  for (size_t i = 0; i < D; ++i)
238  product += p[i] * coords[i];
239  return product;

282  bool operator ==(const Point& p) const {
283  const size_t D = coords.size();
284  for (size_t i = 0; i < D; ++i)
285  if (p[i] != coords[i])
286  return false;
287  return true;
288  }

294  FT norm() const {
295  FT result = 0;
296  const size_t D = coords.size();
297  for (size_t i = 0; i < D; ++i)
298  result += coords[i] * coords[i];
299  //FT r = result;//.to_FT();
300  return sqrt(result);
301  }
302 
307  FT squaredNorm() const {
308  FT result = 0;
309  const size_t D = coords.size();
310  for (size_t i = 0; i < D; ++i)
311  result += coords[i] * coords[i];
312  return result;
313  }
314 
319  const Point normalized() const {
320  return (*this / norm());
321  }
322 
326  void normalize() {
327  const FT n = norm();
328  const size_t D = coords.size();
329  for (size_t i = 0; i < D; ++i)
330  coords[i] = coords[i] / n;
331  }
332 
343  FT operator &(Point& p) {
344  typename std::vector<FT>::iterator it1 = this->coords.begin();
345  typename std::vector<FT>::iterator it2 = p.coords.begin();
346 
347  FT squared_distance = 0.;
348  FT diff0, diff1, diff2, diff3;
349  typename std::vector<FT>::iterator last = it1 + this->dim();
350  typename std::vector<FT>::iterator lastgroup = last - 3;
351 
352  /* Process 4 items with each loop for efficiency. */
353  while (it1 < lastgroup) {
354  diff0 = it1[0] - it2[0];
355  diff1 = it1[1] - it2[1];
356  diff2 = it1[2] - it2[2];
357  diff3 = it1[3] - it2[3];
358  squared_distance += diff0 * diff0 + diff1 * diff1 + diff2 * diff2
359  + diff3 * diff3;
360  it1 += 4;
361  it2 += 4;
362  }
363  while (it1 < last) {
364  diff0 = it1[0] - it2[0];
365  squared_distance += diff0 * diff0;
366  it1++;
367  it2++;
368  }
369 
370  return squared_distance;
371  }
372 
376  typedef typename std::vector<FT>::iterator Point_it;
377 
384  typename std::vector<FT>::iterator begin() {
385  return coords.begin();
386  }
387 
394  typename std::vector<FT>::iterator end() {
395  return coords.end();
396  }

401  void print() const {

403  for (size_t i = 0; i < D; ++i)
404  std::cout << std::setprecision(20) << coords[i] << " ";
405  }

412  friend std::ostream& operator <<(std::ostream& s, const Point& p) {
413  s << std::fixed << std::setprecision(9) << std::setw(12);
414  for (size_t i = 0; i < p.dim(); ++i)
415  s << p[i] << " ";
416  return s;
417  }
